plot: In 1908, Sultan Abdul Hamid faces resistance from the Young Turk party, while also becoming infatuated with a visiting Austrian singer.
title: Abdul Hamid, el sultán rojo
plot_es: In 1908, Sultan Abdul Hamid faces resistance from the Young Turk party, while also becoming infatuated with a visiting Austrian singer.
plot_en: In 1908, Sultan Abdul Hamid faces resistance from the Young Turk party, while also becoming infatuated with a visiting Austrian singer.

cast.role: Sultan Abdul Hamid II /              Kelar - his double
cast.name: Fritz Kortner
